00023 #ifndef _BASEMGR_H_
00024 #define _BASEMGR_H_
00025 
00026 struct CIPL_ConsoleItem
00027 {
00028         LPFN_CiplMgrConsoleCallback pConsoleCallback;
00029         LPVOID pConsoleContext;
00030 };
00031 
00032 typedef std::list<CIPL_ConsoleItem> ConsoleList;
00033 
00034 class CBaseMgr : public CMcUnknown, public ICiplMediaEventSink
00035 {
00036 public:
00037         CBaseMgr();
00038         virtual ~CBaseMgr();
00039         STDMETHOD(NonDelegatingQueryInterface)(REFIID riid, LPVOID *ppvObj);
00040         // ICiplMediaEventSink
00041         STDMETHOD(Notify)(IN LPVOID pSinkContext, IN LONG lEventCode, IN ULONG_PTR pulEventParam1, IN ULONG_PTR pulEventParam2);
00042         STDMETHOD(ExecuteImmediateInternal)(const TCHAR *szSession, INT argc, const TCHAR *const *argv, TCHAR *szReturn, UINT ccReturn, UINT *pccFilled);
00043         STDMETHOD(ExecuteImmediateCmdString)(const TCHAR *szSession, const TCHAR *szCommand, TCHAR *szReturn, UINT ccReturn, UINT *pccFilled);
00044         STDMETHOD(ExecuteImmediateCmdList)(const TCHAR *szSession, INT argc, const TCHAR *const *argv, TCHAR *szReturn, UINT ccReturn, UINT *pccFilled);
00045         STDMETHOD(RegisterConsole)(LPVOID pConsoleContext, LPFN_CiplMgrConsoleCallback pConsoleCallback) PURE;
00046         STDMETHOD(UnregisterConsole)(LPVOID pConsoleContext, LPFN_CiplMgrConsoleCallback pConsoleCallback) PURE;
00047         STDMETHOD(ReturnInt)(INT nValue, TCHAR *szReturn, UINT ccReturn, UINT *pccFilled);
00048         STDMETHOD(Return2Int)(INT nValue1, INT nValue2, TCHAR *szReturn, UINT ccReturn, UINT *pccFilled);
00049         STDMETHOD(Return3Int)(INT nValue1, INT nValue2, INT nValue3, TCHAR *szReturn, UINT ccReturn, UINT *pccFilled);
00050         STDMETHOD(ReturnString)(const TCHAR *szString, TCHAR *szReturn, UINT ccReturn, UINT *pccFilled);
00051 
00052 protected:
00053         STDMETHOD(SetEscape)(TCHAR tcEscape)
00054         {
00055                 InterlockedExchange(&m_tcEscape,(LONG)tcEscape);
00056                 return S_OK;
00057         }
00058         void cprintf(LPCTSTR szFormat, ...);
00059 
00060         CRITICAL_SECTION m_csEvent;             // lock out event thread versus command thread
00061         ConsoleList m_ConsoleList;
00062         const TCHAR *m_szConsolePrefix;
00063         LONG m_tcEscape;
00064 };
